articles.title: July Banquet
articles.summary: The SJAA held its annual banquet on July 16th, attended by approximately 50 people, where new officers were installed, including Dr. A.S. Gregory as President. Outgoing President Dave Erickson highlighted the club's growth and its focus on public outreach, a sentiment echoed by Dr. Gregory who also stressed increased member participation. The evening concluded with a stimulating presentation on infrared astronomy by NASA physicist Dr. Lawrence Cathlff.

articles.title: EVENTS FOR AUGUST
articles.summary: This document outlines a series of events scheduled for August, including a monthly meeting change, an overnight star party at Fremont Peak, and a public star party at the Skyline site. It also mentions a planning meeting at the Commedy Bank Bldg. and includes some humorous, non-event-related commentary.
